title: Deodorant Stones of America Pure & Natural Crystal Deodorant Mist 180 mL
description: DSA has formulated the first liquid deodorant spray made from natural mineral salts. These are the same salts that are found in DSA's deodorant stones. This fine mist spray is a welcome addition to Deodorant Stones of America's line of 100% pure and natural deodorant products which is good for you and the environment.
